scripts.build:deps: npm list --omit=dev | xargs -0 | awk '{print $2}' | grep "^[a-z@]" | sed -E 's/(^[a-zA-Z@].*?)(@.*)/\1/g' > d
scripts.build:deps:badges: bun run build:deps && cat d | xargs npx update-badge --behind && rm d dd
scripts.build:devdeps1: npm list --include=dev | xargs -0 | awk '{print $2}' | grep "^[a-z@]" | sed -E 's/(^[a-zA-Z@].*?)(@.*)/\1/g' > dd
scripts.build:devdeps:badges: bun run build:deps && bun run build:devdeps1 && bun run build:devdeps2 && cat dd | xargs npx update-badge --behind  && rm d dd
scripts.cm: git pull && git add . && bun git:all &&  cz
scripts.dep:check: bunx upgradeps && npm outdated | xargs && bunx npm-check-updates && bunx check-dependencies && bun ./node_modules/npm-check/bin/cli.js -s | xargs && npm audit
scripts.dev: bun i && bun run build:bun && bun concurrently -k "bun run hot-reload" "bun run live-reload" "bun run format:watch" "bun run test:watch:fast"
scripts.dev:all: git pull && bun run dev:pre && bun run lint:quick && bun run lint:ox && bun run dev:build
scripts.dev:build: bun run build && bun run docs && bun dev
scripts.dev:linux: bun i && bun concurrently -k "bun run hot-reload & xdg-open http://127.0.0.1:3000" "bun run dev:post"
scripts.dev:mac: bun i && bun concurrently -k "bun run hot-reload & open http://127.0.0.1:3000" "bun run dev:post"
scripts.dev:node: bun i && bun run build && bun concurrently -k "nodemon ./dist/server.js localhost 8080" "bun run live-reload" "bun run format:watch" "bun run test:watch:fast"
scripts.dev:post: bun concurrently -k "bun run live-reload" "bun run format:watch" "bun run test:watch:fast"
scripts.dev:pre: bun run upgrade:full && bun rebuild && bun run dep:update:all && echo "YOU CAN ALSO RUN npm-check TO SEE ADDITIONAL DEPENDENCY UPDATES" && npm i && bun run depcheck && bun run prune:mod && bun run license:summary && bun format && bun run security
scripts.dev:win: bun i && bun concurrently -k "bun run hot-reload & start http://127.0.0.1:3000" "bun run dev:post"
scripts.dev:wsl: bun i && bun concurrently -k "bun run hot-reload & wslview http://127.0.0.1:3000" "bun run dev:post"
scripts.docs: echo building typedocs; bun typedoc --validation.notDocumented --plugin typedoc-plugin-coverage >/dev/null
scripts.format: sort-package-json && bun prettier --write . --cache --cache-strategy metadata --log-level log | grep -v "unchanged" | xargs
scripts.format:git:modified: bun prettier --write $(git diff --name-only --diff-filter d | grep '.ts$' | xargs)
scripts.prod: npm prune --omit=dev && bun prune:mod && NODE_ENV=production bun run ./src/app.ts
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun install && bun run build
scripts.rebuild:bun: bun run clean && bun install && bun run build:bun
scripts.security: bunx snyk code test --all-projects || echo 'Issues were found please run: bunx snyk code test' && bunx snyk test --all-projects || echo 'Issues were found please run: bunx snyk test'
scripts.test:dev: bun run test:clear && bun run test:watch
scripts.upgrade: sudo bun i -g n && sudo bun i -g npm@latest && sudo n latest && hash -r && bun upgrade
scripts.upgrade:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm bun.lockb package-lock.json && bun pm cache rm && sudo bun i -g n && sudo n prune || true && sudo npm uninstall -g n && sudo rm -rf /usr/local/n && sudo rm -f /usr/local/bin/node
scripts.upgrade:full: bun run upgrade:clean && bun run upgrade
